name: LooisCornerstoneHolder

attributes.name: SafeERC20

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add
Ownable

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract
      to the sender.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner
transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@title Destructible
@dev Base contract that can be destroyed by owner. All funds in contract will be sent to the owner.
attributes.name: Destructible

attributes.documentation: @dev Transfers the current balance to the owner and terminates the contract.
attributes.name: destroy
